jobDescription: JOB:Data ScientistJOB OVERVIEW This position is for a Data Scientist. The responsibilities include innovation, design, and support. This is principally a role for someone with strong statistical and data science background. Someone who can translate this knowledge into Analytical Models that will help optimize the business. The role requires a creative thinker who can propose innovative solutions by using data science approaches on existing sets of information and validate those findings by using an experimental and iterative approach.JOB RESPONSIBILITIESAnalysis, design, architecture, development and support various Data Science Tools and applications like R, RStudio, Python, Jupyter Notebooks, Anaconda, SAP PA, HANA PAL, etc.Work with key business partners to prioritize modeling initiatives, manage timeline expectations, and ensure that technical solutions meet business needs.Be capable of working in a big data environment, processing large volumes of data efficiently and using this data for Analytical Modeling.Support the design, development, rollout of analytical solutionsWork hand in hand with Data EngineersSupport custom solutions built using various technologies such as R, Scala, Python, SQLQUALIFICATIONS   Skills Required:Must have academic and work experience in the area of Statistics, Statistical and Analytical Modeling. Master degree or higher in Statistics, Data Science, Computer Science or a related discipline.4 – 5 years’ demonstrable experience in developing, building and implementing Analytical modelsDetailed demonstrable knowledge of data science tools and programming languages like R, Python, RStudio, Jupyter Notebooks, Anaconda, TensorFlow, SAP HANA PAL etc. Capable of completing projects with tools like R, RStudio, Python, and Anaconda.Detailed demonstrable knowledge of various Machine Learning libraries, and tools.Individual will possess deep statistical/data science background but should be also interested in learning about O&G; and applying the statistical background to O&G.;Be innovative, pushing the envelope, unafraid to fail and yet results oriented. Must be a self-starter, mature enough to work with a customer directly with minimal supervision.
